meanings.definition: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level; a large steep hill.
meanings.sent1: The mountains were covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: We hiked up the mountains to see the view.
meanings.sent3: The mountains seemed to be playing hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The mountains loomed majestically in the distance.

meanings.definition: A large amount or quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: There were mountains of laundry to fold.
meanings.sent2: He had mountains of paperwork on his desk.
meanings.sent3: The mountains of dishes in the sink seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The task ahead of her felt as daunting as moving mountains.
meanings.sent5: The mountains of books in the library were a book lover's paradise.
